item.title: Vosk Setup
item.description: Set up Vosk as a system daemon Git & Vosk Server files $ cd $HOME $ git clone https://github.com/alphacep/vosk-server.git Install dependencies $ python3 -m pip install aiortc aiohttp aiorpc vosk $ python3 -m pip install websockets Download Speech Recognition model: Models can be found here: VOSK Models (alphacephei.com) # /home/$USER $ wget http://alphacephei.com/vosk/models/vosk-model-small-en-us-0.15.zip # $ sudo apt-get install unzip $ unzip vosk-model-small-en-us-0.15.zip # Rename the downloaded model for Vosk API to work $ mv vosk-model-small-en-us-0.
